sentences.en: About two - thirds of the weight of phosphate rock consists of unsalable by - products .
sentences.cn: 磷矿的大约 三分之二 变成了无销路的 副产品.

sentences.en: Bowl mills have not been widely employed for phosphate rock to date.
sentences.cn: 钵状磨矿机至今尚未广泛应用于磷矿的磨碎.

sentences.en: Furnace acid is made by reducing phosphate rock with loke in an electric furnace.
sentences.cn: 炉酸是在电炉中用焦炭还原磷矿制得的.

sentences.en: Gypsum may crystallize on the surface of the phosphate rock particles.
sentences.cn: 石膏会在磷矿颗粒的表面上结晶.

sentences.en: Isolated starch granules contain up to 0.05 % nitrogen, some fatty acids and some phosphate.
sentences.cn: 提纯的淀粉颗粒含有0.05%的氮 、 一些脂肪酸和一些磷酸盐.

sentences.en: It has been suggested that magnesium form a chelated structure with the phosphate groups.
sentences.cn: 有人指出,镁与磷酸基因能构成螯合结构.

sentences.en: Phosphate rocks from different deposits vary widely in composition.
sentences.cn: 不同的矿床出产的磷矿其组成有显著的差异.

sentences.en: Residual amounts of iron and aluminum dilute the phosphate content.
sentences.cn: 残采的铁铝降低了磷矿的含量.

sentences.en: Sea water contains about 0.07 mg / litre of phosphate.
sentences.cn: 海水含磷酸盐约为0.07毫克/升.

sentences.en: The calcium carbonate content of phosphate rock determines the pore structure.
sentences.cn: 磷矿中碳酸钙的含量决定了磷矿的毛细孔结构.

sentences.en: The cobalt and phosphate form a thin-film catalyst around the electrode that then use electrons from the electrode to split the oxygen from water.
sentences.cn: 钴和磷酸盐在电极周围形成了薄膜型的催化剂，这些催化剂就利用电极发射的电子从水中分解氢和氧。

sentences.en: The hydrocarbon content of this phosphate ore provides most of the heat needed for the calcination.
sentences.cn: 这磷矿所含烃量能提供锻烧所需的大部分热量.

sentences.en: The phosphate also acts as a binder.
sentences.cn: 磷矿还起胶结剂的作用.

sentences.en: The phosphate was deposited by the decay of marine microorganisms.
sentences.cn: 海洋微生物腐烂后沉积形成磷酸盐。

sentences.en: The role of these glands is to regulate calcium and phosphate in our bloodstream.
sentences.cn: 这些腺体的作用是稳定血液中钙质和磷酸盐的含量。

sentences.en: The tricalcium phosphate constituent is converted to phosphoric acid and calcium sulfate.
sentences.cn: 磷酸三钙组分转化成为磷酸和硫酸钙.

sentences.en: They dissolved cobalt and phosphate in water and then zapped it with electricity through an electrode.
sentences.cn: 他们把钴和磷酸盐溶解到水溶液中，然后，通过电极对它们进行电解。

sentences.en: We make superphosphate by reacting rock phosphate with sulphuric acid.
sentences.cn: 我们使磷酸盐岩同硫酸发生化学反应制造过磷酸钙.

sentences.en: What would be the consequence to an organism if arsenate were substituted for phosphate? Arsenate is very toxic to most organisms. explain why.
sentences.cn: 如果砷酸盐取代了磷酸盐会对有机体产生什么后果？砷酸盐对大多数有机体是非常有毒的，解释。

trans.tran_cn: 磷酸盐，（含有少量磷酸的）汽水
trans.tran_en: one of the various forms of a  salt  of  phosphorus  , often used in industry
